headline: Wall Street Analysts Think Kroger (KR) Is a Good Investment: Is It?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Kroger (KR) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

raw.headline: Wall Street Analysts Think Kroger (KR) Is a Good Investment: Is It?
raw.summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Kroger (KR) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: Kroger, Albertsons gained upper hand with Colorado workers through unlawful pact, lawsuit claims
summary: The union for the chains’ employees had a weaker hand in negotiating wages because Albertsons agreed not to poach its rival’s workers during a strike, a complaint filed Monday alleges.

raw.headline: Kroger, Albertsons gained upper hand with Colorado workers through unlawful pact, lawsuit claims
raw.summary: The union for the chains’ employees had a weaker hand in negotiating wages because Albertsons agreed not to poach its rival’s workers during a strike, a complaint filed Monday alleges.
